title: Beacon node stops suddenly after `Deposit contract` message

# ðŸ’Ž Beacon node doesn't work

### Background

My beacon node stops after `[2022-11-04 19:15:05]  INFO node: Deposit contract: 0x00000000219ab540356cbb839cbe05303d7705fa`

### Description
I run my beacon node using:
```
cd ~/prysm && ./prysm.sh beacon-chain --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8551 --jwt-secret=/root/jwtsecret
```
and it worked since the merge, but today after around 11 am UTC it suddenly stopped working. I tried to restart it but since then it just stopps at message:

```
[2022-11-04 19:15:05]  INFO node: Checking DB database-path=/root/.eth2/beaconchaindata
[2022-11-04 19:15:05]  INFO db: Opening Bolt DB at /root/.eth2/beaconchaindata/beaconchain.db
[2022-11-04 19:15:05]  INFO node: Deposit contract: 0x00000000219ab540356cbb839cbe05303d7705fa
```
I tried updating my GETH and i tried updating prysm but it doesn't seem to help.
Output from GETH:

```
WARN [11-04|19:19:29.500] Snapshot extension registration failed   peer=611e7df6 err="peer connected on snap without compatible eth support"
INFO [11-04|19:20:33.067] Looking for peers                        peercount=35 tried=38 static=0
WARN [11-04|19:21:10.629] Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain! 
```
